lenders.name: La Vernia High School
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to help tose who are trying to help themselves. We want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: History students at La Vernia High School, La Vernia, Texas.

lenders.name: Noreen
lenders.loan_because: Our Pathfinder Unit thought that this is a great way to help others and learn about their countries while learning to manage our own finances.

lenders.name: Asha & Sudeep
lenders.loan_because: Born and raised in Nepal, we have a first hand knowledge of the credit crisis small business entrepreneurs face in developing countries. We would like to help empower them and hopefully our small loan would positively impact their businesses and their lives.

lenders.name: Keala
lenders.loan_because: I have come to deeply respect the ability of people to make a life out of the most humble tools and resources. I greatly admire their ingenuity, their determination, their imagination and capacity to hope, but overall I admire their ability to take those strengths and use them to change their world. I loan because I also want to change the world in my own small way, and ultimately to be a part of something larger than myself.

lenders.name: Emilia
lenders.loan_because: I need continued work in "this planet and care de oxigen with many trees and to make a ecologyc farm
lenders.occupational_info: Well, my work  is too, in first time, to the care of medio Ambiente. and the second time, to may mothersn with childres, but to be singles.

lenders.name: kim
lenders.loan_because: I am excited about what this site is doing in the lives of folks around the world. As a person who spends half the year in 3rd world countries for work, I see first hand very ambitious people living in poverty...and how it could be eliminated when an opportunity is realized.

lenders.name: La Vernia High School
lenders.loan_because: We loan to help those who are working hard to make a better life for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: History students at La Vernia High School, La Vernia, Texas.

lenders.name: Marjolein
lenders.loan_because: It's good to do so.

lenders.name: Nikki and Kian
lenders.loan_because: Kian says we made the loans because we wanted to help them get a bettter life.

lenders.name: karen
lenders.loan_because: Each according to their need; each according to their ability.
lenders.occupational_info: Drafting is my profession.  I work closely with architects and engineers in the design of various types of buildings.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: I guess I'm not being very original here, but I think this a great opportunity to help people find their way out of poverty through local initiatives - rather than large-scale industrial crap. This also a way for those people to use their entrepreneurial skills and develop them through the learning by doing process, which would not have been accessible to the less wealthy tiers of the population.
lenders.occupational_info: I read words and try to frame them in a way the professor doesn't have the choice to jot down an "A" on my sheet.

lenders.name: Rachel 11 yrs Tori 8 yrs
lenders.occupational_info: Rachel - 11 years old & Tori -8 years old

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.occupational_info: I help people start businesses

lenders.name: Tilly
lenders.loan_because: It gives women the chance to control their own destinies and gain financial freedom.  Even with opportunities, we all need assistance from time to time. As a woman, I believe that it is important to support other women in their endeavours, as they empower themselves and enrich the lives of those around them. With the access to education, finance and ability to financially support themselves, they can have choices and freedom.  I send both lenders and entrepreneurs, the very best of wishes for success.

lenders.name: Marshall
lenders.loan_because: we must.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: Its a way to "give back" that gives me direct information about how my contributions are working for people.
lenders.occupational_info: I build computer cameras - cameras that take pictures that are for a computer, not a person.

lenders.name: Robbie
lenders.loan_because: I want to feel more directly involved with someone I am helping than I do when I send funds to a more anonymous individual.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from teaching in the state system. I taught students from age five to 17 over the years. Now, i volunteer in my last school.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: I feel so lucky with my life circumstances and family and friends. I think this is a great way to show gratitude to the world by helping someone to attain their goals and better their lives.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky that I can.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: what I can give makes a big difference for someone else

lenders.name: Nathan

lenders.occupational_info: Nothing but Love :)

lenders.name: nkf

lenders.occupational_info: Investments.

lenders.name: Travis

there is no completely logical reason I have the money and another doesn't so why should I keep it?
God blesses people so it can overflow to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help inner city churches do health outreaches in their communities

lenders.name: Dino & Sara
lenders.loan_because:

YOU must be the change you wish to see in the world. ~Mahatma Gandhi
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a big office with a bunch of Lawyers.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: a few dollars can have a small impact here but a big impact elsewhere.
lenders.occupational_info: Some like college because of the free time.  Others like working because of the money.  As a grad student, I have neither, but I'm still having a great time.

lenders.name: Soularwave

lenders.occupational_info: I do administrative work for small business people (mainly coaches) who are located anywhere in the world.

lenders.occupational_info: We help people to secure their future should there be a loss (fire, theft, flood) -- basically we help people get back on their feet when a loss occurs

lenders.name: Karen

lenders.occupational_info: I teach art and art history to students ages 14 - 18.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I spent a career as a lender & see how simple loans can change people's lives.  Now I would also like to help people struggling in other countries.
lenders.occupational_info: Today I am retired but my former work was meeting with people, hearing their needs & goals & making loan decisions for our Credit Union.  Since I was there for 15 years, many people came back to me & I got to see the changes & improvements in their lives.

lenders.name: Rhodenid
lenders.loan_because: I love people with the love of our Lord Jesus.

lenders.occupational_info: I repair and sell computer.

lenders.name: Amber

lenders.name: Will Holt
lenders.loan_because: it improves the world, effectively and efficiently.  I've loaned $27,750 to date in 278 different loans.  Of the $24,322 in loans that have ended, I've lost $134 (56bps of credit losses).  If you exclude one agency in Afghanistan responsible for 3 loans I made, I've lost $33.

lenders.name: Puneet

lenders.name: Girl Soldier
lenders.loan_because: I love to help other people improve their lives while I have the means to do so.  I believe there are enough resources in our world to go around for each person to have at least their basic daily needs met.  I hate to see people go without their basic needs when they are making the effort by working hard.  If you have the means to help another person, do so and do it today, you may not have tomorrow to do it or they may not have tomorrow.  Now is your time to make a difference.

lenders.loan_because: I continue to do it because it makes me feel good that someone will pay it forward. Like the circle of life so too will this money keep going.
lenders.occupational_info:
Lots of number checking of sales. cash received and money to pay out.  And at the end of the month I let the owners know what profit they made that month and in the last 12 months total.  

Basically you must love numbers and computers

lenders.name: Constance Burger
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I really care about giving people a sense of dignity. I know it means  a lot to me when I accomplish something toward financial independence in my life, and so I know it means  a lot to the people who receive our loans.
lenders.occupational_info:
I write the stories and poetry that rise up in my heart in hopes to encourage and inspire humanity.

JUST BELIEVE
You’ve got to see beyond the moment.
You’ve got to see beyond the now.
For there’s a place to see,
A future destiny,
With no need - to ask how. 

Oh just believe, just believe,
Remember those words you heard in your heart,
It was no fantasy.
Oh just believe, just believe,
For that day in time - when all is defined,
And all is redeemed.

Just close your eyes,
And let your heart take you there again.
The first time - when your heart,
Made hope - its true friend.

Spend time with your dreams there,
Painting all their colors supreme.
Filling in all the details,
And taking them to the extreme.

Oh just believe, just believe,
Remember those words you heard in your heart,
It was no fantasy.
Oh just believe, just believe,
For that day in time - that all is defined,
And all is redeemed.

lenders.name: Zaadz Visionary Music
lenders.loan_because:
This lender's account is fueled by sales of the Zaadz Visionary Music community's benefit compilation, "The Dream Is Valid."  All of the artists and businesspeople involved get exposure, and all proceeds get recirculated the world over to empower people.  People get great music by  shopping in alignment with their values, and their money helps promote sustainable business practices.  Everyone wins – and we prove that the good, beautiful, true, and practical can all support each other.  

For more information, please visit
http://thedreamisvalid.bandcamp.com
lenders.occupational_info:
We are a community of artists and appreciators who recognize a new relationship between art, business, science, and spirituality - and are exploring the new commerce of art as loving effort.  

Our benefit compilation can be listened to and purchased at http://thedreamisvalid.bandcamp.com

lenders.name: Schrodinger
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Sleep, Eat, Sleep, Invest in good people, Sleep.

lenders.name: Asha
lenders.loan_because:
I am in desperate need of $9,000.00. I have been running my home based business successfully for the last 6 years, it afforded me the opportunity together with my husband's job to purchase our own home. My problem arised when I started having kids, kid #1 came in 2004, kid #2 came in 2006 and now kid #3 who is just 2 months old. My business has the potential to do very very well, but my problem is when i got pregant with my third baby, my 2nd baby was just 2 months old and having two subsequent pregnancies that close together it left me very very exhausted and unable to run my business. My husband worked very hard to take care of the house bills and the other two kids, since he is not very educated he can do only trade jobs, it did pay some bills but not enough to totally pay all. Now I had my third baby and I am very well  now but my business is suffering, I lost many customers during the time i was pregant. I need this money to catch up on many bills, Property taxes in arrears for one year 3000.00 , tax return due $532.00,  power and gas in arrears $400.00 and many other bills. I do not want to loose my  house, this is the first house i have ever owned, i am making my mortgage payments just fine. Please if you people out there can help me get out of this problem I will be sure to PAY BACK THE LOAN. Once my backlogged bills gets taken care of then I am back to square one and can afford all my bills and more since I am in full health after having the 3rd baby. Together with my husband and my salary we can have a very good living.
Thanks so very much.
lenders.occupational_info: Costume Jewelry. Stay at home mom with 3 kids to support.

lenders.name: Ann & Rob
lenders.loan_because: We have travelled and met just the sort of people for whom Kiva is set up. It is our way of putting something back in.
lenders.occupational_info: Rob works as an educational manager and I work in publishing and  computing coaching.

lenders.name: Almeta
lenders.loan_because: I see the importance of microeconomics
lenders.occupational_info: Raising future leaders

lenders.name: Khanh
lenders.loan_because: I need to enlarge our cinnamon-worm farm. We use cinnamon-worm to feed the fish.
lenders.occupational_info: You will smell the cinnamon in place where people think it can't be. That is my farm.

lenders.name: Murray
lenders.loan_because: It is great to be able to help those who are helping themselves; and by offering so little it means so much to them.

lenders.name: Janelle
lenders.loan_because: I feel spoiled to live in the relatively wealthy USA where we complain about the slightest inconvenience. It is great to be able to share in some small way.
lenders.occupational_info: I run the office of a brilliant, compassionate, world-class attorney; I do everything needed to help him offer legal services to our clients and to interact with the Courts.  We provide urgently needed assistance to people who truly deserve the help. I love it.

lenders.name: Hunter
lenders.occupation: Director of Programs, Pat Tillman Foundation
lenders.loan_because: I am human.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Radiology

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: Many small actions can change the world.

lenders.name: Elleni
lenders.loan_because: I am very fortunate and feel blessed. To be able to assist someone in need in a real and valuable way is a wonderful thing.
lenders.occupational_info: I had my own business - selling beds to people. . I am now retired after being injured in a road accident.

lenders.name: Darin Greyerbiehl
lenders.loan_because: I've seen how it works...and it works well.

lenders.name: Tami
lenders.occupation: Interior Architect, Life Adventurer, Kiva Fellow
lenders.loan_because: I've seen with my own eyes that just a little bit makes a difference in the lives of those with limited resources + opportunity

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: as tough as times get, I never forget how fortunate I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a graphic designer for internet applications.

lenders.name: pamela
lenders.loan_because: If it was any of us living in a third world country wouldn't we want  help? My heart goes out to those folks that need a loan to improve their lives at the cost of a nice dinner for most of us.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I want to provide opportunities for people.
lenders.occupational_info:
libraries = free education  
education = a better world

lenders.name: Lutz
lenders.loan_because: I believe that supporting enterpreuners is more useful than another tax-funded development project that does not address the needs of its recipients.
lenders.occupational_info: I study civil wars and their causes.

lenders.name: Athar
lenders.loan_because: Have been thru difficult times when out of no where Allah's savior helped me. I feel Kiva is one of Allah's saviors for those who are ready to work hard to come out of difficult times.

lenders.name: Eskil Busck Andersen
lenders.loan_because: I believe it’s the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Rameri
lenders.occupation: Monkey Wrangler and General Manager of Tomfoolery
lenders.loan_because: An accident of birth and I am here with the capacity to help others. Had I been born somewhere else, and been less fortunate than I am, I would hope others would help me.

lenders.name: Adibah
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the principle of helping others to one's best ability... what kiva is doing is something that I personally believe in and I'm glad to be able to help someone else who needs that helping hand... it gives hope and God-willing, life will get better... :)
lenders.occupational_info:
My company is a solution provider and integrator for Intelligent Transportation Systems.  My role is to grow our market share, explore and expand our business portfolio.
My lovely daughter, who will be turning 6 soon, is the source of my strength, inspiration and happiness...

lenders.name: Malavan
lenders.occupational_info: Responsible for an Higher Education Institute

lenders.name: Gbenga
lenders.loan_because: i want to build a community resource centre for poor young people in Ghana. The centre will allow them access information, read books, train them on business skills etc.
lenders.occupational_info: Community development, information sharing, youth development and micro-finance

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Each and every one of us has the opportunity to make a difference each and every day.  And every time someone makes a difference, no matter how small, in the life of someone else, every one of us benefits just a little bit as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop and conduct both instructor-lead and web-based training programs.

lenders.name: maria
lenders.loan_because: We need to learn to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I not only read Tarot but listen to the problems of others and try to help in whatever way I can. Sometimes it is just enough to listen quietly.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because:
"The gratification of wealth is not found in mere possession or in lavish expenditure, but in its wise application."

Miguel de Cervantes (1547-1616) Spanish novelist, dramatist and poet.


Kiva is one small way to be part of finding solutions for  Global Inequality on many levels.
lenders.occupational_info:
The Best Shoe Store and Repair shop in town!!!!
THE SHOE DOCTOR!
Even though we are a very busy full Shoe Repair we also  sell Quality Footwear and Apparel from around the world understanding that as a business owner I have a DUTY to support companies that practice Fair Trade Standards ensuring workers  are paid a living wage!

lenders.name: Russell
lenders.loan_because: I've enjoyed the fruits of my own endeavours and had help and advice along the way. Paying something forward to an individual  who wants to help themselves just seems like the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small systems house specialising in supplying systems and software to the Foodservice Distribution Industry.

lenders.name: Clark
lenders.loan_because: Jesus first loved me. How can I not give a loving hand to help others?

lenders.name: Roswitha
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should be safe, fed, and have a dream.  I want to help others improve their circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: I love books and travel.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I was captured by how well this program works.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: we all need to do our part to help each other live full, dignified, and healthy lives.

lenders.name: Lady Lodge Systems
lenders.loan_because: Instead of buying Christmas cards for our customers, we choose to spend the money on helping people help themselves through Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: LLS is a small systems house providing Systems and Software for the Foodservice Distribution Industry

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: i've been loaned to

lenders.name: TUSAAF Stars & Stripes
lenders.loan_because: We try to help Youth American Football programs in new areas overseas who are looking to expand or improve American Football programs abroad.  TUSAAF works on a very limited budget and works on trying to help new organization recieve aid in building Americna Football programs from top to bottum.
lenders.occupational_info: Team promotes the goodwill of American Football around the world and works with different Youth and amateur organizations to promote the sport in professional manner at the amateur level. TUSAAF has volunteers in the United States and abroad who work on different events to help with the growth of American Football in new areas and up and coming areas that are intersted in starting American Football programs or create new american football programs with highly qualified instructors from the United States who are many case located overseas.

lenders.name: brittany
lenders.loan_because: I believe in open hands.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for Slacker Radio, an internet radio company with a free interface and over 100 different individually programmed format stations, plus the ability to customize your own stations!  I also do independent voicework.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: My Christian faith is all about loving. Justice flows from love. Giving restores justice.  Giving is loving.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm founder of The Water Project, Inc. a non-profit working to provide clean water to developing communities around the world.  Come get involved!

lenders.name: Jose
lenders.loan_because: This is one way of ending the hideous gap between rich and poor
lenders.occupational_info: Helping others make money.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: i can help make someone's life better for the cost of a meal out at a restaurant.
lenders.occupational_info: I help run a small internet & phone company.

lenders.name: Rajni
lenders.loan_because: I want to repay the kindness of people who helped us when we needed it.

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: I want capitalism to flourish throughout the world.  It is the most effective way to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping small company teams successfully serve the customers and market through new products and outstanding service.

lenders.name: Johannes
lenders.loan_because: This is a good way to help, and I can be certain that the money arrives to people that need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an oil company.

lenders.name: Jess Duran
lenders.loan_because:
There's no greater satisfaction in this world than serving others.  

My parents come from a very poor rural town in Mexico. I could never repay my parents back for all they've done for me, but I can always "pay it forward" to reach and touch someone else. 

I have a VERY comfortable lifestyle here in America, and this reminds me of how blessed we really are.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Media/Communications.

lenders.name: Halo Noir
lenders.loan_because: Things would've been easier if someone had helped me with my entrepreneurial efforts.  Also, I believe this method of help truly makes a difference and isn't just a "temporary fix"!

lenders.name: anthony
lenders.loan_because: Affordable Price
lenders.occupational_info:
Hello my friend,

I hope you are well!

This is ANTHONY LIM and I wanted to give
you a quick heads up on a great new system, that
helps you gain access to one of the most wanted 
and profitable businesses around at a fraction
of the usual cost.

Rather than trying to explain everything here,
I have set up a special link with everything 
you need to know:

http://www.vibolfilms.com

If you have any questions, please contact me.

Thanks and hope to hear from you soon.

Your successfully,
ANTHONY LIM
anthotin@yahoo.com

lenders.name: mary brennan
lenders.loan_because: the way to freedom is by helpiing people to support themselves and their family

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: It feels great.  Because prosperity is easier to share than ever before.  Because everyone who dreams of having an independent business should get the chance to make it work.
lenders.occupational_info: My company writes materials that promote other businesses (mostly entertainment companies and nonprofits).

lenders.name: Kieran
lenders.loan_because: $25 doesn't seem like a lot to me, but it could mean the world to someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a nurse on an in-patient mental health unit.

lenders.name: Carlos & Amy
lenders.loan_because: So others can have a better life...
lenders.occupational_info: Military

lenders.name: Ryosuke
lenders.loan_because: I like the people who are doing or planning new things.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference in a life across the world.

lenders.name: Meghan
lenders.loan_because: I'm surrounded by a community of people who encourage me to help others get out of poverty in a just way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at a university.  I study youth minstry (like teaching youth about God in a way they will understand)

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: because I can.   When I am having a bad day and whining this helps me to realize I really have NO idea!  I am the luckiest girl in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: accounting, taxes, dog rescue and pet portraits

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.occupation: Retired Math Teacher and policy analyst
lenders.loan_because: I want to lend a hand to others in need.  I appreciate the opportunity Kiva, and its founders, have given all of us.
lenders.occupational_info: As a retired person, I founded the Kiva lenders Kennedy Fund and manage this committee.  I also work to improve health care for uninsured individuals in my community.

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: It's a positive joyfull project!!

lenders.name: Janet and her class
lenders.loan_because: we want to support Meagan's new baby girl by making this loan on her behalf.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.whereabouts: Notre Dame de l'Ile Perrot QC

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: i care

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I want to and I can.  My family is blessed with a strong circle of caring and love.  Passing along some of that so others can experience the pride of accomplishment is an easy choice.
lenders.occupational_info: helping young people and families in trouble

lenders.name: Phillip J. Suver, M.D.
lenders.occupational_info: In memory of my father, Phililp J. Suver, M.D. 1923- 2003

lenders.name: The Dude
lenders.loan_because: This is a cool idea.  I wish I had discovered this web site sooner.   I work two jobs so I know what it takes to try and get ahead.  I wish all those requesting loans the very best of luck.
lenders.occupational_info: During the week I work for an oil exploration company and on some weekends I drive a limo around the Houston area.

lenders.name: Jessie
lenders.loan_because: I've traveled to remote areas like Kenya, Guatemala, Belize, Mexico, and have seen first hand some of the needs that some people have. If I can make one person get closer to their goal, that's just amazing!!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a T.V. personality, similar to a VJ. I currently work on Telemundo, a show called Descontrol. It airs Sat's at 1pm.

lenders.name: chelsea
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy serving others

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: Every single person has the ability to help someone else.  I am grateful to be a small part of this global network of lending.

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world.  I want to use my money prosperously and generously.  I am a small entreprenuer myself. and  I love this idea!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people fulfill their dreams.  I never give up on them and I believe that they can do anything!

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: As a mother I feel connected to other mothers everywhere, and want a better life for all of our children.
lenders.occupational_info: I study, teach and write poetry.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is such a great idea!

lenders.name: Grant
lenders.loan_because: giving people a chance to develop their business will make them a greater contributor to society.  Business owners demand effective government.  I view ineffective governemnt as the greatest obstacle for moving out of poverty in developing nations.
lenders.occupational_info: I invest individuals savings into public companies.  I invest in companies that I believe will be successful.

lenders.name: Kaitlyn
lenders.loan_because: At eighteen sometimes I feel the difference I make in the world is limited. Knowing that I can help someone across the world acheive their dreams gives me hope that someone in the future will help me acomplish my dreams aswell. Karma all the way, the world is a beautiful place.

lenders.name: hugo el clamor latinrock
lenders.loan_because: I need to produce and create a music,independed company records to produce many latin rock music,proyects here in colombia like shakira or juanes with my band el clamor,and others and sell millons copys and help much people around the world,and create concerts to preserve and care the earth. and bring to much jobs in concerts ,touring.and help fundations around the world with my music and proyects
lenders.occupational_info: create latin rock pop music,make productions,record music,make concerts touring  and help and cooperate with the music in festivals and campgnes ,foundations

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people better their lives.  Alone, I could not afford to make a difference, but together with other people, the impact is huge!  After traveling to some developing countries and seeing the poverty, I decided to find a way to help someone change their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach special education at a public high school.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: What is such a small amount in the US, can make such a huge difference elsewhere. I'm not rich by any stretch of the imagination so it certainly makes me feel good that I can help in some small way.
lenders.occupational_info: When a government buys our software, I help them learn the best ways to use it. I also manage the people that train the client on how to use the software.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because:
It's the right thing and I can.

"I believe that, as long as there is plenty, poverty is evil." - RFK

lenders.name: Bevin
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the lives of those who want to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: My work consists of providing the best care and opportunities for my family to succeed in life.  To me this is much more than education and financlal success but the success of being a whole person that lives outside of thier small personal world and encompasses all those in the world around them.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of anything better than helping someone achieve a dream and improve their lives and those lives around them. What an opportunity for me -  the small amount I can afford can have a meaningful affect on people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a small nonprofit agency that provides rights protection and advocacy for quality of life and care to seniors, disabled persons and people with mental health needs.

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because: Wonderful people around the world are working hard to change lives.  I support those who are in a position of educating others or providing pharmaceuticals in order to lower the world's population
lenders.occupational_info: Parent Education and Personal Growth Trainer

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that children get safely to and from school.  I'm a widower now raising 2 of my 4 grandchildren (ages 6 & 8).  It's challenging but very satisfying.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help someone with their goals as people have helped with mine.
lenders.occupational_info: To share the underwater world!

lenders.name: elizabeth nirbhebe
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense, It's one way to help, I like it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher and an alternative therapies practitioner/healer modalities include: Old Ways Healing, Reiki, Shiatsu, Tui Na, Sat Nam Rasayan, Taiji-5 Element Medical Qi Gong, Kundalini Yoga, Yoga for Youth and Yoga Plus, Early Childhood Special Education and Parent Education licensed, KRI Certified and AOBTA Certified.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: There is nothing like the feeling of giving and knowing you're directly helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: Currently a Fitness Consultant and Personal Trainer in hopes to make a difference in the lives of others. Working on my M.S. degree specializing in low back pain biomechanics.

lenders.name: Wim
lenders.loan_because:
I like to give people the opportunity to get ahead of the game. Microfinancing works really well for this.
I especially like the Kiva model, because the loan amount goes directly to the borrower, with the least possible portion of the loan getting "lost" en route to the borrower.
lenders.occupational_info: I make maps.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering women in becoming strong, and independent.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a psychotherapist specializing in The Psychology of Women which focuses on the roles that we play, the transitions we make between these roles, and how they affect the way we think and feel about ourselves.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.occupational_info: I teach year 12 English, Literature, Psychology & History to students who are not in main-stream schooling.

lenders.name: Jo-Ann
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance.  It only takes a small amount to make such a positive impact on someone's life.

lenders.name: jerry
lenders.loan_because: I believe anyone and everyone, given the opportunity, can succeed and if there are people out there that need opportunities to help their own or other's situations, then they are worthy of help.
lenders.occupational_info: I fix computers.

lenders.name: Shelly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people

lenders.name: I Am Rick
lenders.loan_because: I Can... Call it "Pay It Forward", or Positive Karma, but giving it good, it allows us to prosper in Peace & Love.
lenders.occupational_info: Transaction Coordinator, I put people and things together.

lenders.name: Marnie
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone wants a better life for their children than they have themselves and opportunities  shouldn't be limited on the arbitrary basis of where a person is born.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with a disability to find ways to make it easier carry out their daily living activities and minimise the impact of their disability on their quality of life.

lenders.name: Stan
lenders.loan_because: to help people better themselves and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a software engineer in the manufacturing industry.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: It is fun to think that my humble loan is making a difference to someone across the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain and repair aircraft

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: it is an easy way to help others with the same funds over and over.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance, and I think micro lending is a great way to create a positive change in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the installation of solar systems to help people get their energy from the sun.

lenders.name: melisma
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: tomohiko
lenders.occupational_info: business computer system engineer

lenders.name: Becky
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy feeling connected in a help-giving way to women around the globe.  At 61 loans and counting, I just might be making a difference!

lenders.name: Nilay
lenders.loan_because: i can.
lenders.occupational_info: i help people with seizures (epilepsy) and other problems with their brain or nervous system.

lenders.name: Michael J. 2008edition
lenders.loan_because:
.
Humanity is a disgrace.  Our political systems squander wealth & opportunity.  Our spiritual doctrines lead us astray.  We educate our children to be blind.

The Kiva borrowers give me hope.  Because they're fighting back.  They don't accept that they're too small to be taken seriously; that women shouldn't succeed without masculine guidance; that school is only for the children of the privileged.

The Kiva entrepreneurs are creating change that is beyond the control of established socio-economic models.  My hope is that those changes they create will make us uncomfortable.

Its a gift to be part of this.
.
lenders.occupational_info:
I put words and pictures together.  Web sites, newspapers, book covers, magazines, posters, signs, slides, invitations,  business cards, food labels, logos, flyers, calendars, CD covers...

Its all graphics.  Go to museums, listen to your art teacher, take chances.  There's a lot to art.

lenders.name: Idell
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for our state agency that works to protect the environment.  I am now retired.

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I hope to set a good example for my daughter by helping other mothers in need.

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to stand on their own feet.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to help build bridges from poverty to abundant life.

lenders.name: Jo Ann
lenders.loan_because: Too much of what we hear about the rest of our world are impersonal facts and figures.  This allows us to translate them into real people who share the same hopes we all have.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: victor
lenders.occupational_info: I OWN A FEW SALES COMPANIES

lenders.name: Simon
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to stand on their own feet.
lenders.occupational_info: I am given a gift of management ability.  I try to build bridges for others to pass from poverty to dignity.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lenders.name: Theo
lenders.loan_because: I believe ordinary people, both lenders and borrowers, can still make an important difference in this world.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I am a strong believer in the concept that one man can make a difference. This is one way for me to make a small difference.

lenders.name: Jeroly
lenders.loan_because: I have some extra funds that I want to be put to good use
lenders.occupational_info: I teach mathematics to secondary school students

lenders.name: fabrizio
lenders.occupational_info: major national bank, it department

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because:
I like the concept of helping peole wo are actively working to make their lifes better themselves. This way they can follow their own idea of what they need. 
As it costs me almost nothing to lend, it is only the gesture that I gave them, the rest they achieve themselves and they are no "benfit-victims". I admire them working so hard at such diffucult conditions!

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I need capital fund for demonstrating the art of earning in agriculture.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working for my community for the development of their living by working in the field of agriculture. I would like to make them practical knowledge by showing them how to cultivate a productive fruits and vegetables in their cultivate land.

lenders.name: The Girls
lenders.occupational_info: We are a very close group of girlfriends.  We have been friends for many many years.  We are very pleased to be able to make a contribution to the needs of our world.

lenders.name: Jo-Lyn & Christian
lenders.loan_because: We can only hope that we have each other to lean on when times are their lowest.  It is up to each of us to lend a hand to another.

lenders.name: Stephan
lenders.loan_because: Within our common world we should share & care. The way even poor people support entrepreneurs at kiva.org is simply amazing. Help the people to help theirselves.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: As I view and hear about the rampant destruction of human existence and the natural resources that should be available to everyone, I am disheartened and feel a little helpless in making a difference.  But, through Kiva we can help turn feelings of hopelessness into feelings of empowerment, destruction into a new genesis, and hate and distrust into bonds of friendship.  These feelings are not only for those who are being helped financially, but for us who can be of some small assistance to help our fellow men and women around the world (1 Timothy 6:17-19)

lenders.name: guy
lenders.loan_because: I can and I really believe in this model of charity.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a Regional Health Information Organization that  enables stakeholders to share patient health information electronically in order to reduce medical errors, improve patient care, and improve overall health.

lenders.name: Roger
lenders.loan_because: I believe every dollar can make a difference. Someone once did this to help me get started.
lenders.occupational_info: I help my clients with all aspects of financial management and trustworthy advice.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I believe capital can change lives.

lenders.name: Steve, Casey & Naomi
lenders.loan_because: We want to teach our daughter the importance of giving back in life.  We want her to see that the smallest efforts can have big effects.
lenders.occupational_info: Steve is a police officer, Casey is a stay at home mom and Naomi is a thriving 4 year old.

lenders.name: Cari
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide advice to a government agency that helps people prepare for and recover from major emergencies, whether natural or man-made.

lenders.name: Alfredo
lenders.loan_because: I need to pay inmediate debts

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: We are our brothers keepers. Only when our world unites under the umbrella of compassion will the suffering of so many be eliminated.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English and world cultures to 15-18 year old students.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I don't have much to give, so this way I can do more with what I have.

lenders.name: Niles and Janet
lenders.loan_because: We believe everyone can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Janet is a nurse that works with new moms and their babies.  Niles buys and sells older homes

lenders.name: David
lenders.occupation: MBA Candidate at George Washington University
lenders.loan_because: I believe.

lenders.name: Larry and Carla
lenders.loan_because: On August 29, 2005 we lost everything to Katrina and this is a wonderful venue to be able to give back, a helping hand up...not a hand out .

lenders.name: peter nyaga
lenders.loan_because:
we r one big family, & should assist where we can 2 make our planet better than we found it. 
its a blessing 2 give, than receive,

lenders.name: Boston women that Rock
lenders.loan_because: We decided to group together and loan to women who need help and that for so littlle we hope we can help support and change these womens life's in a small way.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of working women that realize how hard it is to raise familys and support a family. We have all been blessed and want to give back

lenders.name: Wayne
lenders.loan_because: KIVA loans are a great way to help make a dent in world-wide poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Manage computers and networks.

lenders.name: Raphael
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people (when I can. Thanks to KIVA !).
lenders.occupational_info: I play the piano and I teach children of my village to discover their abilities to play music.

lenders.name: konstantinos
lenders.loan_because: just because...
lenders.occupational_info: I work on wastewater treatment and environmental projects

lenders.name: Patti
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way I can help out someone who's trying to make it in a difficult part of the world.  I especially like to help out those entrepreneurs who are farming.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I own a small insurance agency in Colorado.  We help businesses and individuals with their health insurance needs.

lenders.name: CCTPA
lenders.loan_because: The preponderance of evidence seems to support the idea that microfinance is an efficient means of alleviating poverty and providing much-needed opportunities for entrepreneurs in developing economies.
lenders.occupational_info: The Canadian Center for Technology and Public Accountability (CCTPA) is an organization whose aim is to serve as a clearinghouse for information and resources regarding the use of existing and emergent technologies in the service of public accountability. The CCTPA is a Montreal-based non-profit organization established in 2009.

lenders.name: Vanessa
lenders.loan_because: I want to do more
lenders.occupational_info: Numbers, Number and more numbers.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in that I was born into a loving family with wonderful opportunities for me to succeed.  I think that it is right to give some of my good fortune toward helping those that need it more than I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I love technology and programming.  I try to learn all I can about computers and ways of furthering knowledge and innovation.

lenders.name: Massood
lenders.loan_because: I should.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Canadian lawyer [specializing in Immigration Law]

lenders.name: Rick & Soosie
lenders.loan_because: A little here is a lot there.  Bang for your buck!

lenders.name: Riitta
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people to help themselves. I also appreciate the possibility to see where the money goes and how it will help individuals. I choose businesses run by women, because I believe that through women I can also help the future generations.
